query.statement:
SELECT A.HST, A.UPN, A.PJT, A.CST, A.HNO, A.ARA, VALUE(MAX(D.CTEXT2),'') ARA_NM, A.BSU, VALUE(MAX(E.ABR_NM),'') BSU_NM, VALUE(MAX(C.KUNNR_NM),'') KNM, VALUE(MAX(C.ZSITE_NM),'') SPT, VALUE(MAX(F.CS101_IGD),'') IGD, VALUE(MAX(F.CS101_ISD),'') FDT, CASE VALUE(MAX(B.CS116_GND),'') WHEN 'A' THEN '무상공사' WHEN 'B' THEN '무상일반' ELSE VALUE(MAX(B.CS116_GND),'') END MGND_NM, VALUE(MAX(B.CS116_BGT),'') BGT, VALUE(MAX(B.CS116_BMT),'') BMT, CASE VALUE(MAX(G.CS126_GND),'') WHEN 'C' THEN '유상공사' WHEN 'D' THEN '유상일반' ELSE VALUE(MAX(G.CS126_GND),'') END UGND_NM, VALUE(MAX(G.CS126_AMT),0) AMT, VALUE(MAX(G.CS126_USD),'') USD, VALUE(MAX(G.CS126_UMR),'') UMR, A.FSD, A.JJD, '' RMK FROM SAPHEE.ZCST111 A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST116 B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.PJT = B.CS116_PJT AND A.HNO = B.CS116_HNO AND B.CS116_PST = 'A6' LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST157 J ON A.MANDT = J.MANDT AND A.PJT = J.CS157_PJT AND A.HNO = J.CS157_HNO AND J.CS157_RLT = 'Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT H.MANDT, H.CS126_UPN, H.CS126_CST, H.CS126_PJT, H.CS126_HNO, H.CS126_GND, H.CS126_USD, H.CS126_UMR, H.CS126_AMT, H.CS126_ARA, H.CS126_BSU, H.CS126_DDT, H.CS126_PST FROM SAPHEE.ZCST126 H, ( SELECT CS126C.MANDT, CS126C.CS126_UPN, CS126C.CS126_CST, CS126C.CS126_PJT, CS126C.CS126_HNO, MAX(CS126C.CS126_SEQ) CS126_SEQ FROM SAPHEE.ZCST126 CS126C WHERE CS126C.MANDT = '183' AND CS126C.CS126_DDT = '' AND CS126C.CS126_PST = 'A6' GROUP BY CS126C.MANDT, CS126C.CS126_UPN, CS126C.CS126_CST, CS126C.CS126_PJT, CS126C.CS126_HNO ) I WHERE H.MANDT = I.MANDT AND H.CS126_UPN = I.CS126_UPN AND H.CS126_CST = I.CS126_CST AND H.CS126_PJT = I.CS126_PJT AND H.CS126_HNO = I.CS126_HNO AND H.CS126_SEQ = I.CS126_SEQ ) G ON A.MANDT = G.MANDT AND A.UPN = G.CS126_UPN AND A.CST = G.CS126_CST AND A.PJT = G.CS126_PJT AND A.HNO = G.CS126_HNO LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST101 F ON A.MANDT = F.MANDT AND A.PJT = F.CS101_PJT AND A.HNO = F.CS101_HNO LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 C ON A.MANDT = C.MANDT AND A.PJT = C.POSID LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLCODE D ON A.MANDT = D.MANDT AND A.ARA = D.CODE2 AND D.CODE1 = 'CS115' AND D.CODE2 <> 'E1' AND D.LANG = #G_LANG# LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZWBT010 E ON A.MANDT = E.MANDT AND A.BSU = E.LGORT AND E.BSU_ARA > '' AND E.LGORT > '' WHERE 1=1 AND A.MANDT = '183' AND A.ARA > '' AND A.BSU > '' AND A.HST <> 'D'
AND A.ARA = #ARA#
AND A.BSU = #BSU#
AND SUBSTR(A.HNO,1,1) NOT IN ('J','G') AND A.EXC = '' AND VALUE(J.CS157_IGM,'') = #YYMM1# GROUP BY A.HST, A.UPN, A.CST, A.PJT, A.HNO, A.ARA, A.BSU, A.FSD, A.JJD ORDER BY A.ARA, A.BSU, A.UPN, A.CST, A.PJT, A.HNO WITH UR
